name: Freddy's Vr
description:
A Five Nights at Freddy's fan game.

!- Remember this game is early access if you find a bug please report it so I can fix it

Welcome to your new job as a night guard at Freddy Fazbares!
You will have to watch over the animatronics here from 12:00 pm to 6:00 am.
The problem is that the animatronics might try and kill you, this is a VR game.
Non-VR edition: http://gamejolt.com/games/freddy-s/172963
Have fun! :)

Caracters: http://everythinganimations.deviantart.com/art/FNAF-1-SFM-Official-Release-567029012

Using sounds from the original fnaf game.
You can do let's play if you want, just provide a link to the game.

Remember sometimes you have to click on the "..." button to get the newest version.

Instructions:

Bonnie and Chicka
close the doors when they are close.
when they knock they leave and it is safe to open the doors.

Golden Freddy / Freadbear
when he appears in your office turn off your light s.
when he disappears you are safe.

Freddy
when he appears in your doorway don't turn off your lights before closing the door, he will go away if the door is closed and nobody is looking at him, so don't use the door lights next to his door or the camera on that side.

Foxy
Look at him to slow him down, if you look at pirate's cove and he is not there close your left door immediately!

In-game Menu
To use this open the box in the back of the office and press the button!

I will make all 5+ fnaf games in VR, please enjoy
